comments.body: I guess you saw this question coming :smile:  but this function has quite some code repetition with respect to `AsRVec`. Could you please check how to outsource the common parts to a helper method?
I'm gonna give it a try ;)

I don't want to move the error handling out of the function since it complicates more than it helps. However, I've put in a shared function for the conversion of the numpy type string to the respective C++ type. All other parts actually look similar logic-wise but share little information, e.g., the code string we have to jit at the end.
What is exactly the complication? Can't you have a helper function that indicates you if there was some error, and if so you return null? Seriously, there is a lot of duplicated parts...
Factored out common operations between `AsRTensor` and `AsRVec`!
